member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Describes the subresources from a resource that are accessible by using an unordered-access view.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Format
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the resource type of the view. This type specifies how the resource will be accessed. This member also determines which _UAV to use in the union below.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Buffer
member.summary: A structure that specifies which buffer elements can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture1D
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture1DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture2D
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture3D
member.summary: A structure that specifies subresources in a 3D texture that can be accessed.
